Hermes
Class ShipperListAdaptor

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--Hermes.ShipperListAdaptor
public class ShipperListAdaptor
extends java.lang.Object

Title: ShipperListAdaptor.java

Description: Adaptor class to interface with the ShipmentLinkedList. This class controls tools to set the status of shipments, get the shipment info, find the number of carriers that have scheduled, and reset the shipment status.

Version:
2.3
Author:
Ola Laleye, Mike McNamara, Anthony Pitluga

getShipment

public Shipment getShipment(int index)
Returns the shipment at the given index
Parameters:
index - index of the shipment
Returns:
Shipment the shipment at the given index

setShipmentCost

public boolean setShipmentCost(int index,
                               float cost,
                               java.lang.String ip,
                               int port,
                               int numCarriers)
Will update the cost of the shipment indicated by the index passed. If the cost that is passed is lower than the available cost, then that cost is saved as the best cost and the carrier information is updated. Once all shippers have bid upon the shipment, the method will return true.
Parameters:
index - index of the shipment to update
cost - cost to update
ip - ip of the carrier that gave the cost
port - port number of the carrier that gave the cost
numCarriers - the total number of carriers currently active
Returns:
boolean true if all carriers have bid upon the shipment

resetShipment

public void resetShipment(int index)
This method will clear the bidding information of the shipment. This would be called when the shipment has been offered to the carrier that won the bidding process, but after it recieved the shipment, it was infeasible to insert it.
Parameters:
index - index of the shipment

setAssigned

public void setAssigned(int index)
Set the shipment to be assigned to the person with the lowest cost
Parameters:
index - index of the shipment to set

insertShipment

public void insertShipment(Shipment ship)
Inserts a shipment into the shipment linked list
Parameters:
ship - shipment to insert

allAssigned

public boolean allAssigned()
Checks if all shipments have been scheduled
Returns:
boolean true if all shipments scheduled

carrierSched

public boolean carrierSched(int numCarriers,
                            java.lang.String cIP,
                            int cPort)
checks if more than one carrier still hasn't scheduled a shipment
Parameters:
numCarriers - number of carriers registered
cIP - carrier agent IP
cPort - carrier agent port number
Returns:
boolean true if more than one carrier still needs a shipment
